sqllib.sql: SELECT c.component_id, c.component_name, p.file_name, p.short_name, p.gr_name, p.proteome_name, p.proteome_taxid, p.sql_name, o.swissprot_name, o.lineage, o.swissprot_taxid FROM component c, proteome p, organism o WHERE c.genome_ac = ? AND p.proteome_id = c.proteome_id AND o.oscode (+) = p.oscode
